title: Affinity Studio now free
author: dagmx
aiHeadline: Professional-grade design software becomes free, proving that capitalism is just a phase and we're all just waiting for the inevitable collapse.

title: Free software scares normal people
author: cryptophreak
aiHeadline: Why free software is the real horror story of 2025, according to people who panic at the sight of a free lunch.

title: The ear does not do a Fourier transform (2024)
author: izhak
aiHeadline: Scientists finally confirm what you already knew: your ears aren't math geniuses, and that's okay.

title: US declines to join more than 70 countries in signing UN cybercrime treaty
author: pcaharrier
aiHeadline: US decides to sit out the UN cybercrime treaty, proving once again that they're just too cool to play along with the rest of the world.

title: Ventoy: Create bootable USB drive for ISO/WIM/IMG/VHD(x)/EFI Files

aiHeadline: Meet Ventoy: the ultimate tool for geeks who think burning ISOs is a fun Friday night activity.
